metadata.title: Pakistan, Denmark resolve to foster maritime cooperation

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 9 (APP):The Federal Minister of Maritime Affairs, Qaiser Ahmad Sheikh and the Danish Ambassador to Pakistan, Jakob Linulf, reaffirmed their resolve to foster maritime cooperation between the two countries on Thursday. The dignitaries expressed this resolve during a dinner hosted by the Federal Minister of Maritime Affairs in honor of the Danish envoy. During the meeting, both officials discussed the potential possibilities of trade between the two countries and ways to further strengthen their ties.
content.summary: The Federal Minister of Maritime Affairs, Qaiser Ahmad Sheikh, and the Danish Ambassador to Pakistan, Jakob Linulf, reaffirmed their resolve to foster maritime cooperation between the two countries.
